sourcesContent:
<ion-header [translucent]="true" class="ion-no-border">
	<ion-toolbar color="dark">
		<ion-title>
			Pendings
		</ion-title>
	</ion-toolbar>
</ion-header>

<ion-content [fullscreen]="true" color="dark">

	<app-lists [completed]="true"></app-lists>

	<!-- <ion-list color="dark">
		<ion-item *ngFor="let list of whishesService.lists" detail color="dark" (click)="editList(list)">
			<ion-label>{{list.title}}</ion-label>
			<ion-note slot="end" color="tertiary">{{list.items.length}} items</ion-note>
		</ion-item>
	</ion-list> -->

	<ion-fab horizontal="end" vertical="bottom" slot="fixed">
		<ion-fab-button color="tertiary" (click)="addingList()">
			<ion-icon name="add-outline"></ion-icon>
		</ion-fab-button>
	</ion-fab>

</ion-content>
